TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT PCMJZE AS MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE_CD, DESCZE AS MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE_DESC , RSEQZE AS REPORT_SEQUENCE_NUM FROM KMA_STAGE.STG_PSPPLCM MINUS SELECT MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE_CD , MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE_DESC , REPORT_SEQUENCE_NUM FROM KMA_PROD.MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE WHERE EFF_TO_DATE>SYSDATE

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT A.EFF_FROM_DATE as EFF_FROM_DATE, A.EFF_TO_DATE as EFF_TO_DATE, A.MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE_DESC as MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE_DESC, A.REPORT_SEQUENCE_NUM as REPORT_SEQUENCE_NUM, A.REC_CREATE_DATE as REC_CREATE_DATE, A.REC_UPDATE_DATE as REC_UPDATE_DATE, A.MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE_CD as MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE_CD FROM KMA_PROD.MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE A WHERE A.EFF_FROM_DATE = (SELECT MAX (A2.EFF_FROM_DATE) FROM KMA_PROD.MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE A2 WHERE A.MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE_CD = A2.MAJOR_PRODUCT_LINE_CD )
